short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integration between DnDBeyond and TableGoblin tabletop gaming tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the encounter state with your players using the the TableGoblin Encounter Tracker at https://.tablegoblin.io. Updates in real time as you change the active turn player, adjust hit-point values, or change initiative order so everyone knows the state of the battle.
The BeyondGoblin browser extension links to your www.dndbeyond.com encounters. Enhancing the dndbeyond encounter builder with the real time turn order display of the TableGoblin Encounter Tracker. so you can build and control the encounters in DndBeyond and share it live with your player during the game!
